C L I C K & P L A Y
Scroll Down
Scroll down

Little Known is a full-service creative studio founded by commercial photographer and director Brit Phelan, with offices in New York and Paris. With a decade of partnerships with top brands like Verizon, Nike, Captain Morgan, Abercrombie, and Apple, we bring a deep understanding that every project is unique. Our approach combines the highest level of professionalism with flexibility, tailoring our services to meet a wide range of budgets and creative needs.

Offering end-to-end creative solutions—including production, editing, VFX, motion graphics, color grading, sound design, and retouching—Little Known is your trusted partner in bringing any vision to life. From capturing the subtlest candid moments to producing powerful, high-impact scenes, we deliver work that resonates, connects, and leaves a lasting impact on your audience, every time.

Close

Ready to make something? Reach out directly and let’s get things rolling!

Brit is also represented by fancy for a full range of creative collaborations.
